headlines: Verizon is a global team of problem-solvers, engineers, technologists, and innovators.

museums-and-institutions.headline: And we are building the future.

educational-database.headline: After acquiring AOL, we went on to add even more to our family, and formed a joint venture—Verizon Hearst Media Partners.

mobile-app.headline: We are rapidly growing in mobility, cloud, video & advertising, broadband & fiber, IoT, and managed security.

browse-and-collect-fairs.headline: Did we mention that we’re making groundbreaking strides in 5G technology?

bringing-together.headline: In this new ecosystem of ever-evolving needs for complex machine-to-machine and IoT solutions, we are moving quickly to stay ahead of increasing demands.

bringing-together2.headline: We are more than just the best network. We are a rising technology company. We're on a mission to lead the industry, improve lives, and grow shareholder value.
